attributes.action: recommend the award of the Victoria Cross to Staff-Sergeant Olaf Schmid of the 11 EOD Regiment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We feel the country owes an immense debt to Olaf Schmid for his gallantry in disarming an extraordinary number of explosive devices in Afghanistan without thought of his own safety and in the face of daily threat. This man deserves the highest recognition and, although we understand that the recommendation for this honour would initially come from his Commanding Officer Major Kier Head, we would like to express our heartfelt support for this award to be made to a man who earned it 64 times over.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
